description: The Manfrotto 701HDV Pro Fluid Video Mini Head is developed specifically to support the latest prosumer and professional light compact HD camcorders. It has been created for improved ergonomics with locks and knobs that allow for a more solid grip and better control. There is a better fluidity thanks to improved internal fluid cartridges, a double pan-bar rosette and a bigger sliding plate to optimize the position of the camera considering its centre of gravity.Maximum working temperature - 60 C Height - 3.7 inches (9.5 cm) Working height - 3.7 inches (9.5 cm) Material - aluminum Independent pan lock Independent tilt lock Tilt drag - fluid cartridge with fixed drag Pan drag - fluid cartridge with fixed drag Counterbalance Balance control - one fix spring for 3.3 pounds (1.5kg) camera weight Quick release Plate type - 501PL Attachment (top) - 1/4'' and 3/8'' screw Attachment (bottom) - 3/8'' female thread Sliding travel of plate - 2.2 inches (58 mm) Pan bars included (no.) - 1 Pan bar positions - 2 Bubble spirit level (no.) - 1 Color - black
title: Manfrotto 701HDV Pro Fluid Video Mini Head
